abstract: The Dutch Supreme Court overturned a ruling that had blocked ABN Amro from selling its United States subsidiary, LaSalle Bank in Chicago, to Bank of America.
snippet: The Dutch Supreme Court overturned a ruling that had blocked ABN Amro from selling its United States subsidiary, LaSalle Bank in Chicago, to Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: Barclays won an important legal victory today in its battle to buy the Dutch bank ABN Amro, although a rival bidding group led by Royal Bank of Scotland was expected to modify its offer, prolonging the biggest banking takeover.

headline.main: Ruling Helps Barclays in ABN Bid
